public static boolean uploadDataSet(java.lang.String dataSetCode,
                                    java.lang.String dataSetType,
                                    OpenBisPropertiesHandler openBisPropertiesHandler,
                                    java.lang.String datasetContentsDirectory,
                                    java.awt.Component componentCallerOrNull)
Uploads a dataset to an openBIS server.

Parameters:
dataSetCode - the openBIS dataset code
dataSetType - the type of the dataset (must exists in openBIS!)
openBisPropertiesHandler - an OpenBisPropertiesHandler object with the dataset properties
datasetContentsDirectory - the directory with the dataset's files
componentCallerOrNull - the Component who has called this method, can be null
Returns:
true if no errors occurred, false otherwise
